sections.title: Oscar Winning Films: AJAX and Javascript87 items

subsections.title: Choose a Year to View Films

content:
Click through a bunch of great films. Learn how content is added to the page asynchronously with Javascript and how you can scrape it.
                            Look for ways that you can tell visually when a site is loading content with AJAX. Then, browse through your network tab to see those AJAX requests and scrape them.
There are3 video lessonsthat show you how to scrape this page.
